product_description: Double-knit construction makes these drawstring pants lounge-worthy, so now you just need to find a coordinating sofa to test them out.
product_details_and_care:
Double-knit construction makes these drawstring pants lounge-worthy, so now you just need to find a coordinating sofa to test them out.
30 1/2" inseam; 18" leg opening; 10" front rise; 14" back rise (size Medium)
Elastic/drawstring waist
Front slant pockets
92% cotton, 8% elastane with 100% polyester contrast
Machine wash, tumble dry
Imported
Lingerie
